sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to present you with the 2017 General Dynamics Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain steadfast in our commitment to sound corporate governance practices and maintaining a strong link between executive pay and company performance in our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The details of our governance and executive compensation programs are presented throughout this Proxy Statement and referenced documents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder engagement remains a key focus for our company to ensure we are aware of your top priorities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Over the past year, we have spoken with shareholders about a number of critical topics, including company strategy, changes to our executive compensation program and our corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overall, we continue to be encouraged that our shareholders view favorably our executive compensation and corporate governance programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board continues to reflect a diverse and extremely well-qualified group of business leaders, aerospace and defense industry experts, and strategic advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The addition of Peter Wall, who joined our Board in August 2016, further strengthens the Boards expertise in global security issues and understanding of key customer concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Catherine Reynolds, who is nominated for election to the Board at the Annual Meeting, will bring to the Board additional financial and business expertise as well as public company governance experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through these additions we will continue to ensure that the tenure of our directors remains balanced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was a year of continuing improvement and accomplishment across our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance was strong with growth in many financial metrics, including earnings, margin, return on sales, return on invested capital and earnings per share, as compared with 2015, which was also an outstanding year for operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With total backlog of nearly $60 billion, our company remains well-positioned for sales and earnings growth in the coming years as we execute on our order book.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors, I invite you to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and, even if you are not able to attend, encourage you to vote by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The accompanying Proxy Statement contains information about the matters on which you are asked to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I urge you to read the materials carefully and vote in accordance with the Board of Directors recommendations.

sentences.text: Your vote is very important.

sentences.text: General Dynamics has a comprehensive risk management program conducted by senior management and overseen by the Board of Directors.

sentences.text: How We Manage Risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following summarizes the key elements of the Boards, senior managements and external advisors roles in our risk management program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board oversees risk management, focusing on the most significant risks facing the company, including strategic, operational, financial, legal and reputational risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board committee is integral to risk management and reports specific risk-management matters as necessary to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Senior management is responsible for day-to-day risk management and conducts a thorough assessment through internal management processes and controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chief executive officer and senior management team provide to the Board a dedicated and comprehensive briefing of material risks at least twice per year, and the Board is briefed throughout the year as needed on specific risks facing the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: External advisors provide independent advice on specific risks and review and comment on risk management processes and procedures as necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Role of the Board of Directors in Risk Management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The full Board reviews and approves annually a corporate policy addressing the delegation of authority and assignment of management responsibility to ensure that the responsibilities and authority delegated to senior management are appropriate from an operational and risk-management perspective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board assesses the companys strategic and operational risks throughout the year, with particular focus on these risks at an annual three-day Board meeting in early February.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At this meeting, senior management reports on opportunities and risks in the markets in which the company conducts business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, each business unit president and each business group executive vice president presents the units and groups respective operating plan and strategic initiatives for the year, including notable business opportunities and risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board reviews, adjusts where appropriate, and approves the business unit and business group goals and adopts our company operating plan for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These plans and related risks are monitored throughout the year as part of periodic financial and performance reports given to the Board by the chief financial officer and executive vice presidents of each business group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also receives briefings from senior management concerning a variety of matters and related risks to the company, including defense budget and acquisition matters and specific customer or program developments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each of the Board committees considers risk as it relates to its particular areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has responsibility for oversight of the companys policies and practices concerning overall risk assessment and risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee reviews and takes appropriate action with respect to the companys annual and quarterly financial statements, the internal audit program, the ethics program and internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To facilitate these risk oversight responsibilities, the committee receives regular briefings from members of senior management on accounting matters; the internal audit plan; internal control over financial reporting matters; significant litigation and other legal matters; ethics program matters; and environmental matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also holds regular executive sessions with internal audit and regular executive sessions with the partners of the KPMG LLP audit team.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Free Cash Flow.

sentences.text: We define free cash flow from operations as net cash provided by operating activities less capital expenditures.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe ROIC is a useful measure for investors because it reflects our ability to generate returns from the capital we have deployed in our operations.
